author: CBS News
title: Mapping coronavirus with artificial intelligence
description: California Governor Gavin Newsom says the technology allows officials to see if Californians are following the state's stay-at-home order. 60 Minutes reports, Sunday.
content: California was the first state to shut down in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. It also enlisted help from the tech sector, harnessing the computing power of artificial intelligence to help map the spread of the disease, Bill Whitaker reports. Whitaker's st… [+1858 chars]
